text: Georgy Mikhailovich Beriev (Beriashvili) ( Georgij Michajlovič Beriev; Giorgi Mikheilis Dze Beriashvili; 13 February 1903 – 12 July 1979), was a Soviet aircraft designer and founder of Beriev. == Other websites == * GlobalSecurity.org Category:1903 births Category:People from Tbilisi Category:Scientists from Georgia (country) Category:Soviet engineers Category:Recipients of the Order of Lenin
title: Georgy Beriev
